title: Brain Visualization App - Demo vs Real Assessment Fixed

problem.user_complaint: Why is the demo different than the final result?
problem.issue: Demo showed custom SVG brain visualization with colored regions, but real assessment just displayed embedded iframes from external websites (BrainFacts.org)
problem.user_frustration: I was looking for something that I could use for people to better understand their Traumatized brain to see the different brain parts, and I want to actually look like a goddamn brain

solution.summary: Created PersonalizedBrainMap component that uses BrainCanvas for actual brain visualization
changes: Replaced IntegratedBrainSurvey (iframe-based) with PersonalizedBrainMap in App.jsx
Now both demo and real assessment show proper brain visualizations
Brain regions are colored based on trauma impact severity (red=severe, orange=high, yellow=moderate, green=mild)
Users can click regions for details, view impact/timeline modes, and export their brain map

result: The app now shows an anatomically-inspired brain with regions that light up based on survey responses
